What did you just say, Jotaro?!
Are you so old that your hearing's gone, old man?
I said I was going to declare my pitch.
I will throw a straight, high to the outside.
Will you believe me or not?
My Stand can see my opponent's soul, as if with night vision.
No matter who a person might be, the soul does not lie.
When the question is asked, I know what they will choose.
I can know the answer 100 of the time.
Episode 42 The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
A straight, high to the outside?
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
A straight, high to the outside...
He is really going to throw that.
What is he trying to do?
Apparently, he defeated my brother by bluffing,
but does he actually think he can intimidate me?
Do not forget that the game will be called once there is an 11-point difference.
But the infielder throws to first, and the batter's out.
There was no mistaking that he chose a high straight to the outside.
Even if he were a holy man like the Buddha, or a genius con artist like my brother,
he could not possibly control his own soul like that.
I am going with a high straight to the outside again.
O-Once again, he is not lying.
You are not cheating, are you?
A forkball, low to the inside!
I know that you are cheating!
What kind of trick is it?
The question has to be a yes or no question!
It seems your mind-reading questions can only be answered with a yes or no.
Your brother liked to say this...
It is not cheating if you do not get caught.
It is not cheating if you do not get caught?
How dare you speak like you know it all?!
Who do you think you are talking to?!
I will figure out your trick, and drag your soul out!
A straight, high and to the outside.
He is serious about throwing a high outside straight.
I will figure out this trick!
His soul's will has not changed.
He is really going to throw that.
I do not know how he is cheating!
Up to the very last moment,
Jotaro's soul intended to throw a straight.
Why the hell is that happening?!
Th-The fact that you took off your school cap is suspicious.
The cheating started as soon as you took off your school cap!
I am going to inspect your seat and controller.
but that cap is how you are cheating!
I am right, are not I?!
Your trick is somewhere around here, right?!
You are using Star Platinum to cheat, are not you?!
You rigged something, did not you, Jotaro?!
I... I can read people's souls!
I can read your soul, Jotaro!
But why are all the pitches different from my readings?!
He, uh... looks like he is aged a bit.
He does not look like a kid in his twenties anymore.
D'Arby, it is your turn to pitch.
I can win one run back in no time.
I am a genius when it comes to games.
There is no way I can lose.
I am a genius when it comes to games!
There is no way I can lose!
Schooled through many battles, it is invincible!
An expert at games is an expert at life!
I will not let this damage me!
The Jaguars score their fifth run!
I accidentally let go of his soul!
Kakyoin's soul and consciousness have returned!
I let go of his soul by accident!
If his soul was set free, that means that your own soul
It is coming out of the controller.
It was not Jotaro controlling it, but you, Joseph Joestar!
I am sure your brother would have been able to figure this out easily.
I am glad you caught on to my idea without a signal.
Of course I can tell what you are thinking!
All that is left is to dispose of him.
I gave you Kakyoin's soul back!
If you want to know if we will forgive you,
why do not you read our souls?
Will I hit you with my right fist or my left?
P-Please, just hit me quickly with your right.
Are you going to do the ora ora thing?!
D'Arby Younger Unable to Recover (Must Retire)
Looks like we broke through some sort of wall.
We can get out there, Jotaro!
Forgive me for interrupting your rest.
I believe that you are aware of this, but about ten minutes ago,
Joestar and his party infiltrated the mansion.
Also, I must report that D'Arby has fallen.
Why do you think D'Arby lost, despite having the ability to win?
The Joestars truly believe, from the bottom of their hearts, that they are willing
to throw away their own lives to save
the one who is Joseph's daughter and Jotaro's mother.
Avdol and Polnareff have also decided
they would risk their lives in order to defeat me.
running from me means running from life itself.
But it seems that foolish notion is important to them.
D'Arby had sworn fealty to me,
but it seems he was not ready to die for me.
That is why he was not able to win in the end.
D'Arby will never know why he lost.
Look at the wound on my neck.
It is likely that if I drink the blood of one more person,
this body of Jonathan Joestar's, which has resisted me,
will fall completely under my control,
and this wound shall be healed.
Will you offer me your blood?
I cannot accept blood from someone of your caliber.
I shall heal my wound with another's blood.
There is no need for you to die.
Return to life with my blood.
I have no doubt that you will triumph.
It truly is best to have your own body.
I will leave them to you, Cool Ice.
I will live up to your expectations.
I shall eliminate them all, without fail.
Open the door if you are going to leave.
After all, your Stand can disappear completely from this world.
The ten minutes we promised them have passed.
Mr. Joestar said to set fire to the place,
but let us enter the mansion instead.
Polnareff, before we go in, there is something I would like to say.
Even if you were to get lost or severely injured within this mansion,
I do not plan to help you.
The same goes for you, Iggy.
but we are on this journey to defeat Dio.
Promise me that even if I am defeated
or become separated from you, you will not stop to help me.
You must think of your own safety first.
We cannot allow all of us to be defeated as we try to save one another.
If we get out of here alive, you would better treat me to a fancy dinner.
All right, let us go in.
It looks like it goes on forever.
Mr. Joestar said to set fire to the mansion,
but in a labyrinth like this,
setting a fire would put us in danger.
It can sense breathing, cutaneous respiration,
and the movements of both humans and animals.
It can also sense another Stand's energy.
Let us observe it as we navigate this maze.
Why are there six flames linked together?
Each one points to the front, back, left, right, up, and down, respectively.
As long as it is within fifteen meters,
it can tell how big something is and which direction it is in.
Mr. Joestar and the others were dragged underground.
The flame has already picked up something.
There is something to our left.
Wh-Who the hell is that guy?!
It appears he was the Stand user that created that illusion.
It was instantaneous, but Iggy defeated him.
Name: Billie Jean Stand Power: Illusions Retired without a fight
His name was Billie Jean, and he was retired without even a fight!
So the mansion has been restored to its normal state.
The flames are not picking up any signs of life.
After you see this writing and turn around, you will...
After you see this writing and turn around, you will...
After you see this writing and turn around, you will...
After you see this writing and turn around, you will... die.
There is no change in the flames.
Iggy's nose has not picked up anything, either.
Iggy's nose and my flames did not sense him at all!
Why did not Avdol's flames sense him?
You could not smell him with your nose?
I do not know where the void inside my mouth leads,
but it is a dimension of darkness.
I must correct your arrogant belief that you can defeat Lord Dio.
I shall scatter you throughout my dimension of darkness.
Is fate telling me to live on?
I heard another wall fall down.
Do not let his spite overcome you!
There is no time to deal with the pain...
Suck on my sword and die!
